translation: Dhāraṇī of the Golden Body, Expounded by the Buddha

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試光祿卿
translation: Minister of Light for the Tripiṭaka Translation of the Sutra of the Western Paradise, the Grand Master of the Chaofeng

source_sentence: 傳法大師賜紫臣施護奉　詔譯
translation: Master Chuanfa Zhichen Shihuofeng Translation of the Imperial Edict
It was then that the Bhagavān addressed them.
"For the benefit of all sentient beings, he spoke this dhāraṇī.
He spoke this dhāraṇī.

If someone could put it on their head, then all the rājas would abandon the left demon.

source_sentence: 所有一切羅剎必舍左鬼等。
translation: All the rājas will surely abandon Zosha and the other demons.
They won't be able to harm them for a thousand yojanas.

source_sentence: 又若有人當誦此陀羅尼一遍。
translation: Also, if someone were to recite this dhāraṇī once.
When he does, there will be gods and sons and their retinues.
"There are gods and their retinues.
They'll stand outside a thousand leagues and defend them.

source_sentence: 又若有人誦此陀羅尼時。
translation: Also, when someone recites this dhāraṇī, there are all the gods and their retinues who stand outside a thousand leagues and defend them.

source_sentence: 所有一切設咄嚕及彼大惡虎狼蟲獸。
translation: All the śatru and those big, bad tigers, wolves, and insects and animals will be contained and prevented from harming them.
They are kept to themselves and can't harm them.
Suppose also that person can summon up the utmost sincerity.

source_sentence: 於日日中誦此陀羅尼數滿百遍。
translation: Every day, he recites this dhāraṇī a hundred times.

source_sentence: 是人即得安膳那藥成就。
translation: That person then will attain accomplishment of the medicine of anaṃsana.

source_sentence: 當用點眼即能見彼三世中事。
translation: With the dotted eye, he'll be able to see the events of the three worlds.

source_sentence: 又若有人誦此陀羅尼時。
translation: Also, if someone recites this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 能令忿怒心者生敬愛心。
translation: It will cause angry people to become respectful and loving.

source_sentence: 又若有人至心誦此陀羅尼二洛叉遍。
translation: Also, if someone wholeheartedly recites this dhāraṇī two times, it'll quell all afflictions.

source_sentence: 一切煩惱悉能息滅　又若有人長時誦此陀羅尼。
translation: All afflictions are calmed down. Also, if someone recites this dhāraṇī for a long time.
That person then attains knowledge of past lives.
Also, if someone recites this dhāraṇī with care.

source_sentence: 加持淨油塗於頭上腹上。
translation: He applies pure oil to his head and belly.

source_sentence: 是人若有頭病腹病及餘一切惡毒等病。
translation: If that person has headaches, abdominal problems, and all the other bad poisons and other illnesses, then that person's illnesses will disappear.
Wherever he rubs it, the illness will dissipate.
Suppose another person takes a grain of pepper and applies it to twenty grains of this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 以此陀羅尼加持二十一遍。
translation: He applies this dhāraṇī and blesses it twenty-one times.
He carries it to the rāja.
Whatever he wishes, he'll get what he wants.
This dhāraṇī has great merit.
If someone wants to accomplish such things, they should accept and uphold it.
You should accept and uphold it.
Dhāraṇī of the Golden Body Spoken by the Buddha
